job_purpose: Design, develop, modify, document, test, implement, install, and support software applications and systems. Architect and design distributed systems for AI social robots, big data warehouses, and machine learning models.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and develop distributed systems for AI social robots
Architect and design big data warehouse to facilitate data analytics
Apply machine learning algorithms to create predictive models being used by Social robots
Present and propose AI solutions to stakeholders
Architecting and implementing big data solutions for healthcare (telehealth), disability, education, business process automation, and retail
Design, develop, and implement Generative AI services
Experience with machine learning model construction and optimization
Solve computer vision problems using Machine Learning and Deep Learning methods
Design webapp user interfaces using React, JavaScript, and TypeScript
Act as a cloud architect combining business processes, industry best practices, and architectural patterns for customer outcomes
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher qualification or equivalent relevant experience
At least five years of relevant experience or relevant vendor certification
Extensive experience in C++, Python, .NET, React, JavaScript, TypeScript, Unity in embedded Linux and Windows environments
Experience in AI, big data, machine learning, cloud solutions, and webapp development
Demonstrated ability as a cloud architect
company_details: Human Centred Innovations focuses on innovative solutions in AI, big data, and machine learning for social robots, healthcare, education, and retail sectors. The company values creativity, collaboration, and cutting-edge technology to drive impactful outcomes.
